question: It’s a 5 vs 5 battle. Both sides are charging towards each other! As you are nearing the enemy, what do you do?
choices_and_roles: Charge in and strike as fast and hard as I can
Get in front of my team and set up defenses to minimize damage to comrades
Stay closely behind or side-by-side with teammates at all times to provide consistent ample support (e.g. healing, buffs, or debuffing opponent
Wait and help attack whoever your teammates are attacking

question: The team battle just started. What do you do?
choices_and_roles: Farm to level up as fast as I can, so I can do lots of damage and potentially snowball the entire game
Level up when I can, but mainly provide, to others and myself, healing and buffs to sustain survival/health and facilitate attacking, farming, and leveling
Focus on doing all three: leveling, protecting, and supporting my teammates
Level up when I can, but mainly be on the lookout for enemies and protect my teammates when needed

question: How would you describe yourself in real life out of these options?
choices_and_roles: I have no preference in leading, assisting, and supporting. I fill in whatever is needed of me.
I prefer to assist and support others. I take the lead if I need to, but it’s not my ideal.
I prefer to take the lead, but will assist and support as needed

question: If you had to choose one, which would you pick?
choices_and_roles: High survivability with healing/buff/debuff capabilities, low-to-mid damage resistance, low-to-slightly below mid damage output
Mid damage output, damage resistance, and healing/buff/debuff capabilities
High damage output, low-to-mid damage resistance
High damage resistance, mid damage output

question: How would you rate your risk tolerance?
Are you often the one who initiates asking others if they want to hang out?
choices_and_roles: I’m usually asking others if they want to hang out first.

I don’t usually ask people if they want to hang out first. I’m often more involved with the plan-making process of the hangout (e.g. providing suggestions on what to do, where to go, etc. and thoughts/opinions)
I don’t usually ask people if they want to hang out first. I might provide hangout suggestions here and there, but I usually just go with whatever my friends/family decide to do.
